content.title: EMI/EMC
content.statement: EMI/EMC is a fundamental concept in Engineering Electrical that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding EMI/EMC helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of EMI/EMC include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of EMI/EMC.

definitions_glossary.concept: A fundamental idea or notion in the domain
definitions_glossary.property: A characteristic or attribute of an entity
definitions_glossary.relationship: A connection or association between concepts
